text: Well, my belief is that Twilight Town is viewed differently by Sora and Roxas. For Sora, we find him waking up from a year-long sleep, whereas for Roxas, Twilight Town is his home, and where his friends are. Roxas' version of the Twilight Town theme is, in my opinion, more touching.
